#id=1
#text=After looking in the fridge , I realized I had to go buy some food .
#id=2
#text=There were essential things I needed , like milk , eggs , flour , sugar , butter , fruits , and vegetables .
#id=3
#text=I usually shop at a discount store that has really good deals on certain items .
#id=4
#text=Towards the end of the month , they hold a wine sale where all bottles are twenty percent off .
#id=5
#text=I usually purchase my wine for the month during that time .
#id=6
#text=Wine was on my list for today as well .
#id=7
#text=My pantry had a lot of dry goods , so I had little intention of purchasing products in that category .
#id=8
#text=My deep freezer was running low , so one of the things I kept an eye out for was meat that was on sale .
#id=9
#text=I was able to find hams at severely discounted price !
#text=After grabbing four bottles of wine with the rest of my groceries , I went to the cashier , checked out , and drove home to put all the food away .
